name: Open-pragmatic-game-book
tagline: A pragmatic book and practical guide for wanna be game developers which introduces the reader step by step and from scratch  to game development and related tasks ,resources and concepts .
body:
open-pragmatic-game-book
========================

a pragmatic book and practical guide for wanna be game developers,which introduces the reader step by step and from scratch  to game development and related tasks ,resources and concepts .
